net.nemerosa.ontrack.extension.issues

Interface IssueServiceExtension

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Extension
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIssueServiceExtension, CombinedIssueServiceExtension, GitHubIssueServiceExtension, GitLabIssueServiceExtension, JIRAServiceExtension

    public interface IssueServiceExtension
extends Extension
    Defines a generic service used to access issues from a ticketing system like JIRA, GitHub, etc.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface net.nemerosa.ontrack.model.extension.Extension

        getFeature

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Gets the ID of this service. It must be unique among all the available issue services. This must be mapped to the associated extension since this ID can be used to identify web resources using the /extension/<id> URI.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the display name for this service.

      • getConfigurationList

        java.util.List<? extends IssueServiceConfiguration> getConfigurationList()
        Returns the unfiltered list of all configurations for this issue service.

      • getConfigurationByName

        IssueServiceConfiguration getConfigurationByName(java.lang.String name)
        Gets a configuration using its name
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the configuration
        Returns:
        Configuration or null if not found

      • validIssueToken

        boolean validIssueToken(java.lang.String token)
        Checks if a token may represent a valid issue token.
        Parameters:
        token - Token to test
        Returns:
        true if the token may represent an issue

      • extractIssueKeysFromMessage

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> extractIssueKeysFromMessage(IssueServiceConfiguration issueServiceConfiguration,
                                                            java.lang.String message)
        Given a message, extracts the issue keys from the message
        Parameters:
        issueServiceConfiguration - Configuration for the service
        message - Message to scan
        Returns:
        List of keys (can be empty, never null)

      • getMessageAnnotator

        java.util.Optional<MessageAnnotator> getMessageAnnotator(IssueServiceConfiguration issueServiceConfiguration)
        Returns a message annotator that can be used to extract information from a commit message. According to the service type and its configuration, they could be or not a possible annotator.

      • getLinkForAllIssues

        java.lang.String getLinkForAllIssues(IssueServiceConfiguration issueServiceConfiguration,
                                     java.util.List<Issue> issues)
        Given a list of issues, returns a link that allows the user to display the list of all those issues in a browser.
        Parameters:
        issueServiceConfiguration - Configuration for the service
        issues - List of issues to display. Can be empty, but not null.
        Returns:
        Link

      • getIssue

        Issue getIssue(IssueServiceConfiguration issueServiceConfiguration,
               java.lang.String issueKey)
        Given a key, tries to find the issue with this key.
        Parameters:
        issueServiceConfiguration - Configuration for the service
        issueKey - Issue key
        Returns:
        Issue if found, null otherwise

      • containsIssueKey

        boolean containsIssueKey(IssueServiceConfiguration issueServiceConfiguration,
                         java.lang.String key,
                         java.util.Set<java.lang.String> keys)
        Checks if an issue key is contained in a set of keys. This set of keys has typically been extracted using the extractIssueKeysFromMessage(net.nemerosa.ontrack.extension.issues.model.IssueServiceConfiguration, String) method.

      • exportFormats

        java.util.List<ExportFormat> exportFormats(IssueServiceConfiguration issueServiceConfiguration)
        List of supported export formats for the issues.
        Parameters:
        issueServiceConfiguration - Configuration for the service

      • exportIssues

        ExportedIssues exportIssues(IssueServiceConfiguration issueServiceConfiguration,
                            java.util.List<? extends Issue> issues,
                            IssueChangeLogExportRequest request)
        Exports a list of issues as text for a given format.
        Parameters:
        issueServiceConfiguration - Configuration for the service
        issues - List of issues to export
        request - Specification for the export
        Throws:
        IssueExportFormatNotFoundException - If the format is not supported.

      • getIssueId

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getIssueId(IssueServiceConfiguration issueServiceConfiguration,
                                                java.lang.String token)
        Normalises a string into a valid issue key if possible, in order for it to be useable in a search. This allows for services to adjust the token for cases where the representation of an issue might be different from its actual indexed value. For example, in GitHub, the representation might #12 while the value to search on is 12.
        Parameters:
        issueServiceConfiguration - Configuration for the service
        token - Token to transform into a key
        Returns:
        Valid token or Optional.empty().

      • getLinkedIssues

        default java.util.Collection<? extends Issue> getLinkedIssues(Project project,
                                                              IssueServiceConfiguration issueServiceConfiguration,
                                                              Issue issue)
        Gets the list of linked issues that can be used to look for issues references (commits, revisions...) accross severak branches.

        By default, returns a collection that contains only issue.

        Parameters:
        project - Project to use for any additional configuration
        issueServiceConfiguration - Configuration for the service
        issue - Root or seeding issue
        Returns:
        List of issues linked to issue. It must include the initial issue.
